name: A Moment of Reflection
description:
Enter a stranger's subconscious and guide them during a brief moment of reflection

A chill, short visual novel with choices and 3 endings.

A submission for for O2A2 and follows the following criteria:

  • one sprite / one character / one pose (with multiple expressions without change in pose
  • one background / one place / one time of day
  • one thousand words
  • one music track or one ambient background noise 
  • one piece of menu background art
Content Warning:

Mild swearing
